review: I wrote a review about three years ago. Everything in that review still stands.  At the time I didn't have any pets. I now have two cats  which I love very much. The pet policy here is very good. You can only have two, but who needs more in

author: Greg Geb.
review: good neighbors friendly staff the only bad thing is first come first serve for parking. not enough spaces so ppl park anywhere they can.

author: Bonnie Garrison
review: I have lived at Northbrook for 25 years. It's not a bad place. Very quiet despite fact that Bennett Drive is  the road right in front. It's close to the airport but very little nose. The manager Joy is great. Friendly and upbeat. If you

author: Phil I-P
review: Anyone know how to get ahold of Doreen, the previous landlord, I know she works for the Cooperate now. I am needing to contact asap thank you it is important. I would forever  grateful and comment on here if you do know and I'll keep checking. Thanks again so much!
